name: Dome (Destus Gamez)
description:
Yo. Whatsup. This game was made for the GoGodotJam which the theme is growth.

Your goal is to shoot does those red squares to stop them from duplicating themselves like a virus. Find their source (where they are spawned from) take it down and that's all.

Head back to when you started the level to replenish your health.

Controls

WAZD for diagonal movement 

Use your mouse to turn player. 

Left click or space to shoot.

Have fun :)

CREDITS

Everything in the game is a piece of me :)

Remember to rate this game and follow me for more pew pew games.
